short_summary: Supply of enclosed cargo trailer and related items
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of enclosed cargo trailer
full_summary:
=================
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:** Enclosed Trailers
-------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-236662/B
**Reference Number:** cb-5718-79517157
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Amendment Date:** June 7, 2023

**Publication Date:** May 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 7, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity:** Worldwide
**Region of Delivery:** Canada

**Contracting Entity:**
National Defence Canada
101 Colonel by Drive
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
Canada

**Contact Information:**
Victor Shepstone
DLP 5-3-4-3
victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (819) 939-3040

**Procurement Overview:**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of enclosed cargo trailers and related items in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR for Configuration 8. This procurement is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement under the Request for Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR.

**Key Dates:**

* Submission Deadline: June 7, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* Delivery Date: Within 120 days after contract award
* Notice Expiration Date: June 7, 2023

**Note:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Language Requirements:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

I made the following changes to the text:
1. Corrected formatting and spacing to make the text more readable.
2. Removed redundant and unnecessary information.
3. Standardized language and grammar throughout the text.
4. Rephrased sentences to improve clarity and flow.
5. Emphasized key dates and deadlines.
6. Highlighted the Contracting Entity and Contact Information.
7. Removed the AVIS DE PROJET DE MARCHÉ notice, as it was already included in the tender description.
8. Improved the text's overall structure
